summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $142,131.53 to pay F. McClellan the balance due upon the contract for the improvement of 3rd Avenue Northwest, and certain other streets, under Ordinance No. 30243, Local Improvement District No. 2589, by constructing trunk watermains from the Water Fund, and directing the City Comptroller and ex-officio City Clerk to draw, and the City Treasurer to pay the same.
